external_games.name: Final Fantasy Legends: Toki no Suisho
Final Fantasy Legends: Toki no Suisho

name: Final Fantasy Legends: Toki no Suisho
summary: Final Fantasy Legends: Toki no Suisho (Final Fantasy Legends: The Space-Time Crystal) is a free-to-play iOS and Android game from Square Enix. It is a role-playing game with a time travel theme.
